body.name: TASVAC Corded Stick Vacuum, 26Kpa 600W Powerful Suction Vacuum Cleaner with LED Floor Head, Lightweight Corded Handheld Vac for Carpet Hard Floor Pet Hair, Bluegray
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 1 hr 7 mins
features: 𝐏𝐥𝐮𝐠 & 𝐏𝐥𝐚𝐲, S𝐚𝐲 G𝐨𝐨𝐝𝐛𝐲𝐞 𝐭𝐨 𝐭𝐡𝐞 T𝐫𝐨𝐮𝐛𝐥𝐞 𝐨𝐟 𝐁𝐚𝐭𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐢𝐞𝐬 C𝐡𝐚𝐫𝐠𝐢𝐧𝐠, C𝐨𝐫𝐝𝐞𝐝 S𝐭𝐢𝐜𝐤 V𝐚𝐜𝐮𝐮𝐦 𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐡 M𝐨𝐭𝐨𝐫𝐢𝐳𝐞𝐝 B𝐫𝐮𝐬𝐡 H𝐞𝐚𝐝, Y𝐨𝐮𝐫 B𝐞𝐬𝐭 V𝐚𝐜𝐮𝐮𝐦 P𝐚𝐫𝐭𝐧𝐞𝐫!

【2024 Upgraded Corded Stick Vacuum】Equipped with a new generation 600W motor, the 26000Pa cyclonic suction provides consistent airflow, effortlessly sucking up and breaking down dirt from all floor types for a thorough clean, which is unmatched by other corded vacuum on the market. TASVAC I7 will bring you the best quality vacuuming experience ever.

【LED Motorized Floor Head】Ultra-efficient motorised V-shaped floor head with 4 bright LED lights agitates dust and dirt leaving carpets and hard floors clean and fresh. Equipped with a rubber strip roller, which can effectively say goodbye to hair clogging and prevents hair from getting tangled on the roller, especially suitable use on hard floors, low-pile and medium-depth carpets.

【Advanced Deep Clean Filtration System】With advanced 4-stages HEPA anti-allergy filtration system the vacuum can remove 99.99% of fine particles from 0.1 microns, making it ideal for allergy sufferers, helping you breathe more easily in your home.

【Multipurpose In One & No Time Limit】This vacuum cleaner comes with a 2 in 1 crevice tool that can transform into a handheld vacuum that is perfect for staircases, sofas, upholstery, pet hair, etc. TASVAC I7 Corded vacuum is the best option for thoroughly cleaning large spaces since you don't have to worry about running out of charge mid-way through your cleaning session.

【Easy To Disassemble & Storage】The stainless steel filter and sponge are washable, you need just clean the dust cup and the filter regularly. With a storage base makes it easy to store without taking up any space and this corded vacuum can also lean on the sofa when you need to rest.

【TASVAC Package】I7 corded stick vacuum comes with a LED rotatable brush head, a retractable metal tube, a 2-in-1 brush for versatile cleaning, two extra filters sponge and a user manuel. Comes with one year of reliable 12-hour response service, accessories replacement, and zero-risk purchase.

productInformation.name: Included Components
productInformation.value: ✔1x 2 in 1 Brush ✔1x Retractable metal tube ✔1x Wall bracket with screws ✔1x LED Motorized cleaner head ✔1x Main Body ✔1x Cleaning gadget ✔2x Filter See more

productInformation.name: Recommended Uses For Product
productInformation.value: 🚀Tips:🚀If the suction declines, please do check whether the tube is blocked, the floor brush is tangled with hairs, or the HEPA needs cleaning; 🚀Please empty the dust cup regularly, and make sure the amount of garbage is not over 80% of it. Too much garbage will block the vents and reduce the suction; 🚀To clean your HEPA filter, use the cleaning gadget to wipe off surface dust. Mesh filter and stainless steel strainer are washable. We kindly recommend exchanging the filter every 3 months according to your use frequency.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great vacuum, great price
reviews.reviewText: Our old vacuum, which was a nearly 7-year-old Dyson, finally gave up the ghost -- right as we were moving from an apartment to a house! Thankfully, we were able to find this vacuum on Amazon that could get delivered in a day and we were able to vacuum the old apartment (and avoid a cleaning fee).This vacuum works well. The battery percent indicator is very helpful, and the different levels of suction are clearly indicated as you switch through the options. It is lightweight, and the suction works well. If you are going from a heavy-duty bagged vacuum to this cordless, bagless vacuum, it will feel different -- when we got our Dyson cordless, I had to get used to a bagless and smaller system. However, I will say that for a cordless, bagless vacuum, this vacuum does very well, and it is reasonably priced.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very nice and versatile vacuum.
reviews.reviewText: This is my first foray into the world of cordless vacuums. I didn't want to pay a lot extra for a vacuum so I was planning to buy a corded vacuum. This Tasvac S8 was on a great special that put it in line with corded vacuums. I decided to give this a try. I must say it is very nice to not have to negotiate a cord for once. This vacuum is very versatile and it is so much easier vacuuming furniture with this vacuum than with my Shark Navigator that would tip over constantly. The Tasvac is very nimble and easy to maneuver. It is very convenient to use on my carpeted stairs but this vacuum does not do a good job on the traditional pile carpet on my stairs. I have to make many passes over the same spot. My experience mirrors other reviews that I have read about regular to higher pile carpet. This vacuum does do a great job on floors, low pile area rugs and furniture. The run time is about 15-20 minutes for me. I was hoping that the brush roller could be turned off on floors, but I do not see a setting to do so. Overall, I am happy with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to put together and detach to empty/use for tighter areas like under furniture cushionsPretty Lightweight and great pivot on the head to get around items very happy with the purchase

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best cordless vaccuum
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely loved the fact that it had strong power to pick up the finest dirt, very quiet, large suction cup, long lasting battery, lightweight, very well built not flimsy, easy to change attachments. All in all there’s nothing I didn’t like about this vacuum bu. I usually never review products, but this one is a winner and I had to let everyone know who are contemplating purchasing . It’s worth it, buy it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Lightest and powerful vacuum .......works around corners ...works on rugs and bare floors without a switch...love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Return on first day after use
reviews.reviewText: This machine does not work on hard floor nor carpet for human hairs. Even a $30 vacuum works better than this vacuum on hard floors picking up hairs. The suction power itself looks fine, but probably some design flaw with head that does not pick up articles and hair.Also the stick is possibly with electronic leakage. It’s hard to tell whether it’s real electronic leakage or static electricity. I touch it twice and got shocked twice so did not dare to try the third time.Returning it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Okay backup machine
reviews.reviewText: I was hoping this would prove to be my go-to vacuum, however that is not the case.Good points - it is very lightweight and easy to use. Am glad it does not have a trigger that you have to continuously press (my arthritic hands can't squeeze for long periods - I'm looking at you, Dyson). It is very easy to maneuver over carpet and bare wood.Not so good points - The cord is too short. Would like to be able to vacuum several rooms without having to unplug and move the cord. I am barely able to vacuum my living room without running out of cord, and my house is a small rancher. If this was the only negative feature I'd give it a higher score, but not the case.The canister is too small, so I am constantly having to empty it, and as I have cats the cat hair is everywhere (not to mention my long hair - ugh LOL).It does not seem to have a very strong suction, so I am not confident it is picking up everything. I got a corded vac because I feel the cordless has less suction power, but will need to reconsider. I'll keep this as my backup/basement vacuum.Given the price it's an okay vacuum, however I am searching for something better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Product is great for the price!
reviews.reviewText: Has great suction on carpet and hard floor. Just what I needed. Only downside is it does not stand upright on its own. It would be a 5 star rating if it did.
